means: 缺乏信心的，不确信的，犹豫的

sentence.Network_en: I have been unconfident in whether this matter can be accomplished.
sentence.Network_cn: 这件事情能不能办成,我心里一直没底.

sentence.Network_en: Tom's performance doesn't meet father's expectations, so he became more unconfident.
sentence.Network_cn: 汤姆的表现达不到她父亲的期望, 所以他变得越来越没自信.

auth_sentence.content: Georgie grew up painfully thin, painfully shy, and painfully unconfident of his abilities.
